butterflyknife.Name: Butterfly Knife
butterflyknife.Description:
Attack an enemy from behind to Backstab
them for a one hit kill.

wrench.Name: Wrench
wrench.Description:
Upgrades, repairs and speeds up
construction of friendly buildings on hit.

bonk.Name: Bonk! Atomic Punch
bonk.Description: Makes you invulnerable for 8 seconds, but cannot attack

critcola.Name: Crit-A-Cola
critcola.Description: Increases speed by 25% and damage by 35% for 15 seconds

buffbanner.Name: Buff Banner
buffbanner.Description:
Deal damage to fill rage meter.
Use horn to activate a buff
that increases damage dealt by 35%
for you and all allies nearby

battalionbackup.Name: Battalion's Backup
battalionbackup.Description:
Deal damage to fill rage meter.
Use horn to activate a buff
that reduces damage received by 35%
and protects you from crits/enchants
for you and all allies nearby

concheror.Name: Concheror
concheror.Description:
Deal damage to fill rage meter.
Use horn to activate a buff
that increases movement speed by 25%
and heals 35% of damage dealt
for you and all allies nearby

sapper.Name: Sapper
sapper.Description: Left click to put the sapper on a building

sharpenedvolcanofragment.Description:
Improves upon Mother Nature's original
design for volcanos by increasing
portability. Modern science is unable to
explain exactly where the lava is coming
from.

thirddegree.Description:
Being a boon to tree-fellers,
backwoodsmen and atom-splitters the
world over, this miraculous matter-hewing
device burns each individual molecule as
it cleaves it.

sunonastick.Name: Sun-on-a-Stick
sunonastick.Description: Spiky end goes into other man.

madmilk.Name: Mad Milk
madmilk.Description: Coated enemies heal you and allies for 60% of damage dealt

wrangler.Name: Wrangler
wrangler.Description: Allows you to control the nearest sentry

chargintarge.Name: Chargin' Targe
chargintarge.Description: Right click to activate the charge

headtaker.Name: Horseless Headless Horsemann's Headtaker
headtaker.Description:
Cursed by dark spirits similar to those
that dwell within the Eyelander.

rocketjumper.Name: Rocket Jumper
rocketjumper.Description:
A special rocket launcher for learning rocket jump tricks and patterns.
This weapon deals ZERO damage.

stickyjumper.Name: Sticky Jumper
stickyjumper.Description:
A special no-damage stickybomb launcher
for learning stickybomb jump tricks and
patterns.

phlog.Name: Phlogistinator
phlog.Description:
Being a revolutionary appliance capable
of awakening the fire element phlogiston
that exists in all combustible creatures,
which is to say, all of them.

loosecannon.Name: Loose Cannon
loosecannon.Description:
Can be charged by holding fire button
Cannonballs does not explode on impact

eurekaeffect.Name: Eureka Effect
eurekaeffect.Description:
§bAlt-fire: Teleport to the spawn or a teleport exit§7

Being a tool that eliminates exertion by
harnessing the electrical discharges of
thunder-storms for the vigorous coercion
of bolts, nuts, pipes and similar into their
rightful places. May also be used to
bludgeon.

cleaver.Name: Flying Guillotine
cleaver.Description: Throw at your enemies to make them bleed!

basejumper.Name: B.A.S.E Jumper
basejumper.Description: Press jump button while airborne to activate

thermalthruster.Name: Thermal Thruster
thermalthruster.Description:
Use the jetpack trigger to activate
Recharging consumes fuel from gas tank
Deal 3x falling damage to anyone you land on!

trigger.Name: Jetpack Trigger
trigger.Description: To use with the Thermal Thruster equipped

gunsligner.Name: Gunslinger
gunsligner.Description: Allows the user to construct Mini-Sentries

pda.Name: PDA
pda.Description: Right click while sneaking to disable HUD

dragonsfury.Name: Dragon's Fury
dragonsfury.Description:
This powerful, single-shot flamethrower
rewards consecutive hits with faster
reloads and bonus damage.

shortstop.Name: Shortstop
shortstop.Description: Mann Co.'s latest in high attitude break-action personal defense.

capperr.Name: §5C.A.P.P.E.R
capperr.Description:
§bVisual Effect On Hit: Fire§7

Turn your enemies in to ash!

pomson.Description:
§bDoes extra damage to armored enemies§7

Being an innovative hand-held irradiating
utensil capable of producing rapid pulses
of high-amplitude radiation in sufficient
quantity as to immolate, maim and
otherwise incapacitate the Irish.

manmelter.Name: Manmelter
manmelter.Description:
Being a device that flouts conventional
scientific consensus that the molecules
composing the human body must be
arranged "just so", and not, for example,
across a square-mile radius.

gaspasser.Description:
Creates a horrific visible gas that coats
enemies with a flammable material,
which then ignites into afterburn if they
take damage (even enemy Pyros!)

splendidscreen.Name: Splendid Screen
splendidscreen.Description: Right click to activate the charge

superrocketjumper.Name: Super Rocket Jumper
superrocketjumper.Description:
Launches a super-rocket that launches you far into the air!
This weapon deals ZERO damage.

lugermorph.Name: Lugermorph
lugermorph.Description:
The ultimate in semi-concealed weaponry.
There's no question you need this gun, the only question is: where will you keep it?

mutatedmilk.Name: Mutated Milk
mutatedmilk.Description:
Coated enemies heal you and allies for 60% of damage dealt
Inspired by the TF2 Movie 'Expiration Date'

breadbite.Name: Bread Bite
breadbite.Description: Inspired by the TF2 Movie 'Expiration Date'

snackattack.Name: Snack Attack
snackattack.Description:
Left click to put the sapper on a building

Inspired by the TF2 Movie 'Expiration Date'

beautymark.Name: Self-Aware Beauty Mark
beautymark.Description: Inspired by the TF2 Movie 'Expiration Date'

holymackerel.Name: Holy Mackerel
holymackerel.Description: Getting hit by a fish has got to be humiliating.

unarmedcombat.Name: Unarmed Combat
unarmedcombat.Description: So nice of the Spy to lend an arm...

batsaber.Name: §cBatsaber
batsaber.Description:
§bVisual Effect On Hit: Fire§7

Energy Overwhelming!
Disintegrate your enemies!

lollichop.Name: Lollichop
lollichop.Description:
Fill (split) your buddies' tummies (skulls)
with delicious candy (cold steel) with this
oversized sugary treat.

scottishhandshake.Name: Scottish Handshake
scottishhandshake.Description:
Your enemies will think you're making
peace, right up until the terrifying moment
that their hand is very seriously cut!
Here's the trick: It's a broken bottle!

apocofists.Name: Apoco-Fist
apocofists.Description:
Turn every one of your fingers into the
Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse! That's
over nineteen Horsemen of the
Apocalypse per glove! The most
Apocalypse we've ever dared attach
to one hand!

awperhand.Name: AWPer Hand
awperhand.Description:
This controversial bolt-action beaut is
banned in thousands of countries, and
with good reason: You could really hurt
someone with this thing.

shootingstar.Name: §5Shooting Star
shootingstar.Description:
§bVisual Effect On Hit: Fire§7

Turn your enemies in to ash!

sharpdresser.Name: Sharp Dresser
sharpdresser.Description:
Every merc's crazy for a sharp-dressed
man. With 15th century murder-knives
extruding from his cufflinks.

apsap.Name: Ap-Sap
apsap.Description: Left click to put the sapper on a building

quackenbirdt.Name: Quäckenbirdt
quackenbirdt.Description:
A marvel of German engineering, the
Quäckenbirdt is a classically handsome
two-tone Australium and tungsten
spywatch for the European assassin who
likes to be reminded how rich he is every
time he turns invisible.

bigkill.Name: Big Kill
bigkill.Description:
Combines style with stopping power. Long
exclusive to Freelance Police, now available
for other blood-thirsty mercenaries.
